episodes.title: PukWHATdgie?
episodes.summary:
It's Sortin Time! Are you a Thunderbird, Wampus, Horned Serpent, or Pukwudgie?  In this episode PotterCaster John Noe and special guest Zack Luye (founder of first ever Game of Thrones fan convention) get sorted LIVE into Ilvermorny houses, the American wizarding school, with the new Pottermore sorting quiz. Join them and Melissa and Frak discuss similarities between Ilvermorny and Hogwarts house traits, as well as plans for the upcoming special live show at GeekyCon to celebrate the Cursed Child release!

 

Episode 258 — PukWHATdgie?

episodes.title: Equality FTW!
episodes.summary:
It's been seven years since we talked about the HPA like this! Learn about how the organization has been changing the world!

It's NOT about those dang tweets, not yet! We will be back soon for those. Right now we are doing a LONG OWED update with the HP Alliance! It's been seven years since we talked about the HPA like this! Seven years! Learn about how the organization has been changing the world, how fans are becoming heroes, and how you can help!

We also talk about Emma Watson at the UN, the future of the Leaky Cauldron and PotterCast...and more! Special host Paul DeGeorge joins in, and we hear from several more members of the HPA!

 

Episode 255 — Equality FTW!

Find the latest episode and explore PotterCast interviews, discussions and more at PotterCast.com

episodes.title: J/K!
episodes.summary:
Welcome to volume two of PotterCast! Just when we thought we were out, she pulls us back in. We gave the show a hearty goodbye this summer but then J.K. Rowling decided to write a few books and announce a new series of Harry Potter-related movies, so we are back. Goodbyes are hard, but reunions are awesome! Join John, Frak and Melissa as they navigate another set of Harry Potter news tidbits. In this episode: The upcoming series of films based on "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them" as well as news about the new Harry Potter theme park. Also, a lot of cat imitations. Our first "Cuckoo's Calling" episode will be next!

 

Episode 251 —  J/K!

Find the latest episode and explore PotterCast interviews, discussions and more at PotterCast.com

Visit the-leaky-cauldron.org for the latest and greatest from Harry Potter's Wizard World.

episodes.title: Nearly There and Back Again
episodes.summary:
PotterCast is back with our yearly episode! ;) We're so sorry to have kept you waiting this long, but we hope you enjoy this look back at some of our favorite PotterCast moments, as well as some news of what's in store for Melissa, John, AND FRAK! Check back soon for PotterCast 250, live from LeakyCon 2013. Lots of love to all of you who have stuck with PotterCast until the very end.
